itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson is joined by Kenny Xu, author of the book “An Inconvenient Minority”,  to discuss the left’s racism and discrimination against Asian-Americans, Harvard’s racist admissions policies, the push to teach Critical Race Theory in schools, and the #StopAsianHate movement.
